person.persName: Benjamin Berry (Christian County, KY, farmer, soldier (CSA), and prov govt conv rep )

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Camilla Berry. Father of Nora Berry, Juliet Berry, and Lee Berry. Farmer in Christian County in 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.Served in the 1st Kentucky Regiment Cavalry (C.S.A.) as private from October 1, 1862, to April 31, 1863. Captured at Cripple Creek, Tennessee, on March 18, 1863. Paroled for exchange and sent to City Point, Virginia, on March 27, 1863.
